title: Stick to these stock themes in what could be a volatile 2022, says Charles Schwab's top strategist
text:
Here's what Jerome Powell's second term as Fed Chair means for your wallet

Keeping Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell at the central bank's top post is likely good news for the stock market, analysts say. See full story.

Don't expect U.S. to follow Europe with new COVID lockdowns

Don't expect the U.S. to lock down again, even though some European countries are reimposing tough COVID-19 restrictions amid a surge in new cases. See full story.

75% of Americans think the government should help them save for retirement

State-sponsored retirement plans are successful and popular -- and more people want access, research says See full story.

Macy's new marketplace could bolster calls to separate its e-commerce business, one analyst says

Macy's has faced pressure from Jana Partners to separate e-commerce from the bricks-and-mortar business, according to Wall Street Journal reports. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

â€˜You can't separate justice from environmental health and environmental protection anymore,' says Lisa Jackson, an Apple vice president and former EPA chief. See full story.
